headline.main: Critic at Large; Playwright Believes Deepest Instinct of Man Is to Protect With Weapons

results.snippet: MEN like weapons more than they like women,  according to Robert Ardrey. Since Mr. Ardrey is a professional playwright ("Thunden Rock"), he can hardly avoid making dramatic statements in his "African Genesis" (Atheneum).

results.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 6 Dr. Vladimir K. Zworykin was granted a patent this week for a rocket to be used in detecting the electric charges on clouds and in influencing weather. He has assigned the patent to the Radio Corporation of America, of which he is...

byline.original: By STACY V. JONES Special to The New York Times

results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 6 Dr. Vladimir K. Zworykin was granted a patent this week for a rocket to be used in detecting the electric charges on clouds and in influencing weather. He has assigned the patent to the Radio Corporation of America, of which he is honorary vice president.

headline.main: BERGMAN: A.B.C. SCIENCE EDITOR

results.abstract: greeted by crowds, Derry, NH, birthplace

headline.main: SHEPARD WELCOMED AT HIS BIRTHPLACE

results.snippet: DERRY, N.H., June 9 (AP)  Comdr. Alan B. Shepard Jr. apologized today for waiting so long after his space ride to return to his birthplace, and then he told a cheering crowd that the "determination and perseverance" he saw in this town as a boy has...
results.lead_paragraph: DERRY, N.H., June 9 (AP) Comdr. Alan B. Shepard Jr. apologized today for waiting so long after his space ride to return to his birthplace, and then he told a cheering crowd that the "determination and perseverance" he saw in this town as a boy has helped shape his life.

GLASS CENTER AWAITS MILLION GUESTS

results.snippet: CORNING, N.Y. By now, one might think,  people would be taking glass pretty much for granted. It has been around for more than 3,000 years; it has become a commonplace part of our daily routine, including glass in the form of fabrics and fibers, and...
results.lead_paragraph: CORNING, N.Y. By now, one might think, people would be taking glass pretty much for granted. It has been around for more than 3,000 years; it has become a commonplace part of our daily routine, including glass in the form of fabrics and fibers, and the glass works of Venice have become a standard item on the European sightseeing tours.

headline.main: Missive Countdown; And then there was the lady who wrote N.A.S.A. to put a parrot in orbit.

results.snippet: WASHINGTON. EVER since Lieut, Comdr. M. Scott Carpenter's three-orbit trip, an avalanche of mail has descended on the National Aeronautics and Space Administration  which had just barely recovered from Lieut, Col. John H. Glenn Jr.'s flight.
results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON. EVER since Lieut, Comdr. M. Scott Carpenter's three-orbit trip, an avalanche of mail has descended on the National Aeronautics and Space Administration which had just barely recovered from Lieut, Col. John H. Glenn Jr.'s flight.
